metadata.title: jenkins: Builds can be filtered by values of sensitive build variables (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in Jenkins weekly and LTS caused by not excluding sensitive build variables when filtering builds in the build history widget. By sending a specially crafted request, a remote,  authenticated attacker could obtain values of sensitive variables used in builds and use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
jenkins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
